title: Drawing, "Rough sketch, room A, for Uris Hotels", July 29, 1955
signed: Signed in graphite, right center: Muh / 7-29-55.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left: 8” / 5-0” / 2-2” / 4/8-2; upper center left: 29-0 / 5-2/21-10 / 6-0/15-10 / 14/1-10; upper center: Mirror / 26-0 / 8-2/17-10 / CHST OF / DRAWER; upper right: DRESSER; center: LOW; right center: CLOTH / CLOSET; lower left: BATH / NEW LOCATION; lower right: A.
description: Detailed sketch of room with furniture. Lower margin, three separate plans for bathroom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rough sketch, room A, for Uris Hotels", July 29, 1955.
July 29, 1955. Crayon on off-white tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-405.
